metaDescription: HiddenBack Cafe — Yalova. Modern, clean, and convenient online menu.

about.heroParagraph1: Right in the city center, tucked away from sight. hiddenback is a calm escape waiting to be discovered in the heart of Yalova.
about.heroParagraph3: The idea was to bring good coffee, homemade desserts, and a warm atmosphere together under one roof. From breakfast to an evening coffee, it offers a space where you can catch your own rhythm at any time of the day.
about.heroParagraph4: Here, the menu is more than a list; it’s an experience that accompanies guests’ memories. Below, you can explore hiddenback’s story, atmosphere, and details more closely.
about.block1Title: A modern meeting point in Yalova
about.block1Paragraph1: Over time, hiddenback became a modern and friendly meeting spot in the center of Yalova.
about.block1Paragraph2: Students, developers, bankers, lawyers, and creative minds all share the same tables.
about.block1Paragraph3: For some, it’s a quick espresso break; for others, a calm filter coffee with a laptop; and for many, an evening meetup with desserts. At hiddenback, everyone moves at their own pace.
about.block2Paragraph1: Cheesecakes, brownies, tiramisu, and croissants are prepared fresh every day. Our desserts are crafted to pair with coffee, with balanced and light flavor profiles.
about.block2Paragraph2: You can easily review ingredients and prices through the online menu.
about.block3Paragraph1: hiddenback is designed for both those working on a laptop and those chatting with friends. Soft, warm lighting, comfortable seating, and calm music become a natural part of the experience along with the menu.
